name: Shinkai: DuckDuckGo Search
description: Searches the DuckDuckGo search engine. Example result: [{"title": "IMDb Top 250 Movies", "description": "Find out which movies are rated as the best of all time by IMDb users. See the list of 250 titles sorted by ranking, genre, year, and rating, and learn how the list is determined.", "url": "https://www.imdb.com/chart/top/"}]
author: Shinkai
